title: Glacier Bay National Park & Preserve: Use and Credit
body: Using Photo Gallery Images         Johns Hopkins Inlet National Park Service  To everything, its proper credit... As a National Park Service website, please remember that everything posted here is considered in the public domain. When submitting a photo, please indicate whether you want it downloadable or copyrighted (original file not downloadable through the website).  Using photographs While all of the images are in the public domain, when using photos from the Glacier Bay website, please always credit the individual photographer or National Park Service if no photographer is listed.
